data.name: YouTube - PitchBlack dark/black theme
data.description:
*TURN ON DARK MODE IN YOUTUBE BEFORE APPLYING THIS THEME*

Inspired by the legendary PitchBlack Substratum theme for Android, this is a PitchBlack theme for YouTube. In true PitchBlack fashion, you get to pick the accent color of your choice! A list of all PitchBlack accents and background variants are available below along with their hexcodes. Do note that you can pick any color you want from the color picker but these are the official colors. Enjoy! *P.S Pssst..!! Do rate and share the theme if you liked it. :D

data.name: Bored Panda Dark Theme
data.description: This theme provides a night mode experience to the www.boredpanda.com website. Also, it hides the colorful banner normally displayed on top of the page.

data.name: Telegram Web Redesigned
data.description: Make Telegram Web look more modern. Based on @RisingFire redesign concept (https://www.behance.net/gallery/95824793/Telegram-Refresh-A-Long-Needed-Update)

data.name: Ecosia - Dark theme 2020
data.description: Ecosia dark theme - verified and working 2020 A dark theme for the Ecosia search engine & services. Uses lightweight CSS to ensure a seamless dark theme experience. Compatibility Tested on browsers: Firefox, Chrome, Edge, Opera Works with Ecosia mobile-mode Tested on 'Stylish' and 'Stylus' extensions Currently works with the following Ecosia sites: www.ecosia.org info.ecosia.org blog.ecosia.org Planned development: ecosia.teemill.com Any issues, let me know and the theme will be updated ASAP - just ensure you are using the latest version at all times Important note: To turn on/off Ecosia advertisements in the search engine, see the 'Customize Settings' button found next to the installation button Development Team: FocusOnTheSun - Search engine dark theme Freaky Lord - Information site, blogs & consultancy

user.name: FocusOnTheSun
user.about: I guess that I make some styles sometimes when I'm bored?

data.name: Facebook New Design Bigger Chat
data.description:
With the new facebook design that been rolled out to some users the chat windows are still really small.

This changes them to be a bit bigger so that the new right side popout makes reading and replying to chats much easier
